paragraphs.text: Epaphroditidae[1] is a family of the Mantodea, containing species found in Africa and the Caribbean.  Before 2015, it had been placed as the subfamily Epaphroditinae, in the Hymenopodidae, but is now excluded.[2]

paragraphs.title: Subfamilies and Genera
paragraphs.text: The Mantodea Species File[3] lists two subfamilies containing the genera:
